metadata.Title: CVE-2020-5529 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HtmlUnit prior to 2.37.0 contains code execution vulnerabilities. HtmlUnit initializes Rhino engine improperly, hence a malicious JavScript code can execute arbitrary Java code on the application. Moreover, when embedded in Android application, Android-specific initialization of Rhino engine is done in an improper way, hence a malicious JavaScript code can execute arbitrary Java code on the application. It was discovered that HtmlUnit incorrectly initialized Rhino engine. An Attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary Java code.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-5529` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libhtmlunit-java - 2.8-1ubuntu2.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: htmlunit package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.8-1ubuntu2.1').
